SELECT u.id, u.name, u.email, u.create_date, u.update_date FROM users u
LEFT JOIN user_roles ur ON u.id = ur.user_id LEFT JOIN roles r ON ur.role_id = r.id
LEFT JOIN user_preferences up ON u.id = up.user_id WHERE u.id = #{id} GROUP BY u.id, u.name, u.email, u.create_date, u.update_date
